imdb.plot outline: Nova Scotia is a place of stunning and diverse beauty, wonderful people, great food, and burgeoning wine and micro-brewery industries. We explore the province, sharing adventures and experiences against backdrops of gorgeous scenery, showing them why this is a bucket-list destination.
imdb.title: Experience Nova Scotia
plot: Nova Scotia is a place of stunning beauty, wonderful people, great food, wine and micro-brewery industries. We explore the province, sharing adventures and gorgeous scenery with viewers, showing them why this is a bucket-list destination.::Blair Thornton

Nova Scotia is a place of stunning and diverse beauty, wonderful people, great food, and burgeoning wine and micro-brewery industries. We explore the province, sharing adventures and experiences against backdrops of gorgeous scenery, showing them why this is a bucket-list destination.::Carolyn Stampeen
